entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
